summary: Small Excel spreadsheet which makes it easy to find which plants/ingredients contain the needed effect.
descriptionHtml:
First of all the file needs Excel to be opened properly (Works in OpenOffice 3.3.0 - thanks to LordVeldor for checking).

In the spreadsheet you will find a drop down list allowing you to select a required alchemy effect. After selecting the effect you will see a list of plants/ingredients which contain the selected effect.

I am not a pro Excel user so please don`t flame me, i know that it could have been done better. BTW feel free to modify the file if you think you can do it in a better way.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updated the spreadsheet to allow searching for the plants as well as for the effects.
There is a similar file posted on Google Docs for all mobile users (allows easy usage via mobile devices):

[url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AskrZnQrC8N3dDN5eFBiSHhVenFQUDNCNVFfTnEzVnc]File on GoogleDocs[/url]

Thank you goes to:
Ladoquin
LordVeldor
author: Pysiu
